thread.section_title: Extra Space Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Extra Space Storage | www.extraspace.com
thread.title: John Donnelly
thread.title_full: Extra Space Storage reviewed by John Donnelly

author: John Donnelly
title: John Donnelly
text:
From the initial contact to filling the storage room, everything has been good. The store managers are friendly and accommodating and easily accessible when needed. The facility is spotless, and on one visit, the manager was mopping the bay area floors.
I moved in in January, and the temperature and humidity has been at a very comfortable and constant temperature.
I would recommend this facility to anyone in need of extra storage space.
